DarkMouse::

She frowned as Drillbit just walked up to her computer.  She wasn't 
normally a possessive bot. But when it came to computers, she was 
very possessive. ONly how do you tell your leader not to touch the 
computer.  She turned away and looked at the wall.  She had to 
swallow her feeling and her pride yet again and let the leades be 
leaders.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> He raised an eye browl plate.
> "Both Killfest and I are co- Commanders," he explained to 
Quickstrike. 
> He turned back to Killfest.
> "My troops arn't in place for anything yet. We need a plan. I have 
a few
> ideas."
> He walked over to the comp where Dark Mouse was.
> "Excuse me, a sec."
> He tapped a few keys, witch opened incodded comm channels to all of 
his
> and Killfests troops.
> "This is Commander DrillBit. If you are in a area populated by 
Megatrons
> troops move away from them. I would like you stay close enough to
> moniter them though. We will be attacking soon. Stand by for more
> orders," he said in a wisper, so hopefully, none of Megatrons troops
> heard.
> Then he went back to Killfest.
> "I say we gas the areas where most of Meg's troops are. Then we 
storm
> them. It would be better if we could end this quickly. You agree?"
